name: Super Galactic Star Planet Racers
description:
A racing game wherein you must manipulate your planet's orbit around a dancing sun via a grappling tether in order to beat your opponent in collecting points...

Yeah, it's kinda out there.

Created in 48 hours given the theme "Loop" by Team BeeChill:

  • Brandon Blakmore: Production
  • Addison Dobias: Sound Design and Music
  • David McCullough: Art and Programming
  • Shrinath Rao: Programming
